actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to reestablish a Senate Central American Negotiations Observer Group.
short_title: Central American Negotiations Observer Group Resolution

summary.text: Central American Negotiations Observer Group Resolution - Reestablishes the bipartisan Senate Central American Negotiations Observer Group to act as official observers as part of the U.S. delegation to any bilateral or multilateral negotiations dealing with the question of peace in Central America involving Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, or Nicaragua.

titles.title: Central American Negotiations Observer Group Resolution
A resolution to reestablish a Senate Central American Negotiations Observer Group.
